SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
class UserControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive JUnit Test suite for the UserController class.

This suite employs Reflection to inject mock UI components and invokes methods on the JavaFX thread. It targets 100% code coverage by testing public API, private helper methods, UI cell factories, and error handling.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Method Details

    • initJfxAndEnv

      @BeforeAll static void initJfxAndEnv()
      Initializes the JavaFX Toolkit once before all tests. Prevents "Toolkit not initialized" errors.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test execution. Creates a dummy data file, initializes the controller, and injects mocks.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection or file I/O fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up resources after each test. Deletes the temporary test file.

    • createDummyFile

      private void createDummyFile() throws IOException
      Helper method to create a temporary CSV file with test data. Includes valid books, CDs, and edge case entries.
      Throws:
      IOException - If writing to the file fails.

    • injectMockUI

      private void injectMockUI() throws Exception
      Uses Reflection to inject JavaFX controls into the controller. Bypasses the need for an FXML loader.
      Throws:
      Exception - If field access fails.

    • runOnFxThreadAndWait

      private void runOnFxThreadAndWait(Runnable action)
      Executes a Runnable on the JavaFX Application Thread and waits for it to finish. Essential for testing UI-related logic safely.
      Parameters:
      action - The code to execute.

    • testInitializeLoadsData

      @Test void testInitializeLoadsData()
      Tests that the controller initializes correctly and loads data into the table.

    • testWelcomeLabelUpdates

      @Test void testWelcomeLabelUpdates()
      Tests that the welcome label updates correctly when user details change.

      Tests reload functionality.

    • testFileParsingEdgeCases

      @Test void testFileParsingEdgeCases() throws IOException
      Tests file parsing robustness with corrupted lines. Ensures the application doesn't crash.
      Throws:
      IOException - If write fails.

    • testPrivateParseIntSafe

      @Test void testPrivateParseIntSafe() throws Exception
      Tests the private helper method `parseIntSafe` via Reflection. Needed for 100% coverage of utility methods.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • testPrivateNormalizeBorrowedBy

      @Test void testPrivateNormalizeBorrowedBy() throws Exception
      Tests the private helper method `normalizeBorrowedBy` via Reflection.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • testCellFactoryPrivacy

      @Test void testCellFactoryPrivacy()
      Tests the CellFactory logic for hiding Due Date and Fine Amount for other users. Simulates the TableCell updateItem method.

    • testRowFactoryStyling

      @Test void testRowFactoryStyling()
      Tests the RowFactory logic for coloring rows based on status.
